getAssetProxy(bytes4).return: The asset proxy registered to assetProxyId. Returns 0x0 if no proxy is registered.

registerAssetProxy(address).details: Registers an asset proxy to its asset proxy id.      Once an asset proxy is registered, it cannot be unregistered.

params.assetProxy: Address of new asset proxy to register.
